response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, aiming to make it more accessible to you while still ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
